short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that autofills forms with your data.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:

Tired of filling out forms repeatedly? Meet Autofill Extension, your new best friend for form filling! Whether you're a software tester or just someone who frequently encounters forms, this extension will save you time and effort.

Key Features:

Save Your Data: Fill out any form once, and save the data with a single click.
One-Click Refill: Automatically refill forms with your saved data with just one click.
Customizable Entries: Manage and edit your saved form entries to keep your data up-to-date.
Secure Storage: Your data is stored securely, ensuring your privacy is protected.
User-Friendly Interface: Easy to navigate and use, even for those who are not tech-savvy.
Perfect for Testers: Streamline your testing process by quickly filling out repetitive forms.
How It Works:

Fill: Enter your data into any online form.
Save: Click the save button to store your form data securely.
Refill: The next time you encounter the same form, click the refill button to automatically populate the fields with your saved data.
Why Choose Autofill Extension?

Efficiency: Drastically reduce the time spent on filling out forms.
Convenience: Easily manage multiple form entries for different purposes.
Reliability: Works seamlessly with various forms and websites.
Boost your productivity and make form-filling a breeze with Autofill Extension. Download now and experience the convenience!
